title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: Intergenerational Learning for Social Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social participation experience and digital communication skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Participants can explain generational value differences between youth and elderly with over 80% linguistic accuracy through three or more intergenerational café discussions.
Learners can develop community problem-solving strategies and submit presentation materials through mixed-generation team projects (2 youth + 2 elderly members).
Participants can independently resolve technical communication issues between generations with over 70% success using digital collaboration tools (e.g., Padlet, Zoom).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
